entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 08:47 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 08:36 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
